category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Male Factory Worker, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2 and ?? Factory emojis. These are http://emojipedia.org/male-factory-worker-type-1-2/
name: man factory worker: light skin tone

bn:00104995a: Of or relating to or resulting from industry.
Of or relating to or resulting from industry
Of or relating to industry, notably manufacturing.

bn:00064681n: A member of the working class (not necessarily employed)

bn:00032675n: A plant consisting of one or more buildings with facilities for manufacturing
Single building or group of buildings and installations destined to industrial activities.

A factory or manufacturing plant is an industrial site, usually consisting of buildings and machinery, or more commonly a complex having several buildings, where workers manufacture goods or operate machines processing one product into another.
An establishment where products are manufactured using industrial methods.
Facility where goods are made, or processed
A building or other place where manufacturing takes place.
A manufacturing plant for paper, steel, textiles, etc.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The man factory worker emoji on Apple devices showcases a dedicated individual with a light skin tone, sporting a classic hard hat and work attire, all rendered with Apple's characteristic realistic lighting and soft rounded edges. This emoji features subtle 3D shading that gives it a tactile, almost tangible quality, suggesting a sense of diligence and hard work. It's commonly used on Apple devices to represent labor, industry, manufacturing, or simply someone engaged in a demanding job.
